content.prompt: Assume that people like onions on their hamburgers. If the supply of hamburgers decreases, the demand for onions will most likely

choices.label: remain unchanged because hamburgers and onions are different goods
increase because hamburgers and onions are substitutes
increase because hamburgers and onions are complements
decrease because hamburgers and onions are complements
decrease because hamburgers and onions are substitutes

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
